script.title: ezsetup.slax
script.author: phil.shafer
script.synopsis: Mimic the "ezsetup" script as an op script
script.description: This example script mimics the "ezsetup" script that ships on some low-end boxes. It constructs two styles of configuration. The first part asks questions about the device and builds stock junos config. The second asks about the management interface and builds non-junos config. Then a transformation is run that turns this config into junos config.
